item.title: Design Research on Laundry Habits in Loughborough
item.description: Hunt Statement Background and initial Hunt statement In this research, we focus on the process of washing clothes and study the impact of clothes washing on the environment. A scoping tool: The 5Ws and 1H (Who, What, When, Where, Why, and How) is used to investigate a certain brief or context. Pet owners were intrigued and decided to study. I myself am a pet owner, and there are many pet owners across the world.
